short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload files to chatGPT, up to 10 at a time. Click or drag and drop files to upload. Download files for generated code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your chat interactions with ChatExt. Designed for anyone who uses ChatGPT, ChatExt is the perfect tool for anyone looking to make working with their digital workspace more convenient.

Key Features:

Seamless File Management: Upload and download files directly within the chat interface. ChatExt's broad file type support guarantees compatibility and convenience.

Intelligent File Chunking: Automatically segment large documents into manageable pieces for smoother, uninterrupted conversations.

Custom Download Buttons: Easily save csv and code snippets with download options.

Data Privacy: With a commitment to your privacy, ChatExt doesn't collect or save your data. 

Broad File Type Compatibility: ChatExt supports a vast array of file types such as .java to .json, and .txt to .docx, and .csv. Currently, ChatExt doesn't support .pdf and .xlsx files, but we're constantly working to expand our file compatibility to cater to your evolving needs.
